titleStmt.title: To the Right Honourable the Councell of State the remonstrance of Don Alonso de Cardenas of the councell of His Catholicke Majesty, and his embassador in England.
titleStmt.author: Cardenas, Alonso de.

notesStmt.note: Lpro copy dated in MS. on p. 2: 5 April 1649.
Wing CD-ROM, 1996 gives a range of dates 1642-50.
Concerns the complaints of, among others, Huet Laet.
Reproduction of original in the John Carter Brown Library.
